sw08objectscartographer01.name: Cartographer

rewards.message: You find a cartographer who sells maps of the land for 1000 gold.  Would you like to buy a map?

sw08objectscartographer01.onEmptyMessage: My maps cost 1000 gold, which you don't seem to have.  Please stop wasting my time.
sw08objectscartographer01.onVisitedMessage: You've already seen all my maps laddy, now run along.

sw08objectscartographer02.name: Cartographer

rewards.message: You find an old fisherman who has the most detailed maps of the seas that you have ever seen.  Would you like to purchase a set of maps for 1000 gold?

sw08objectscartographer02.onEmptyMessage: My maps cost 1000 gold, which you don't seem to have.  Please stop wasting my time.
sw08objectscartographer02.onVisitedMessage: You've already seen all my maps laddy, now sail away.
